page.title: 12SHOPS IN H.GREEN & HAZLEMERE
page.content: Each housing area has its own shopping centre.Most of them are food shops.The Windmill Estate,Widmer End and Turner's Place,Holmer Green only have small shopping parades.Park Parade,Hazlemere has the widest choice of shops including a freezer centre,shoe and carpet shop.There is a one way service road with parking spaces all along it. The largest shopping centre is at Hazlemere crossroads.This includes banks,solicitors and petrol stations. The shops are on the main road so parking is difficult.All the shopping centres are used frequently by local people for day to day needs,but most shoppers go to High Wycombe for larger amounts.There is a farm shop on the A404,but there is a threat to close this,because it sells fruit and vegetables from other places as well as its own.
